cause.description:
This group is intended to be an information sharing network for people who want to see the Wollongong, NSW, economy grow and for its community to reach its full potential.
Please don't donate any money to this cause.
1. Well informed participation is the key to a healthy democracy
2. A strong democracy relies on diverse opinion and debate in an environment which encourages dignity, tolerance and respect
3. Through democracy and hard work we create and fairly share the benefits of growth
4. The more people who spend money in the Illawarra, the greater its growth and the better off its people will be
cause.mission: see the Illawarra community and economy prosper through progressive means
cause.name: Friends of the Illawarra
